```{r coop, echo=FALSE, include = FALSE}

# link reverse bars

data_wide <- spread(long_df, output, score) %>% replace(is.na(.), 0) %>% filter(turn %in% c("BR01","BR02","BR03","BR04","BR05")) %>% filter(time %in% c(0,1,7,8,14,15,21,22,28,29,35))

datawide_ccrtot <- data_wide %>% group_by(turn,time,condition,note) %>% summarise(ccrtot = sum(ccr))
datawide_nrgtot <- data_wide %>% group_by(turn,time,condition,note) %>% summarise(nrgtot = sum(energiaaquisita))

df <- merge(data_wide, datawide_ccrtot, by = c("turn","time","condition","note"))
df <- merge(df, datawide_nrgtot, by = c("turn","time","condition","note"))

df$propccr <- df$ccr / df$ccrtot
df$propnrg <- df$energiaaquisita / df$nrgtot

dfpropccr <- df %>% filter(time %in% c(8,15,22,29)) %>% select(turn,color,time,condition,note,propccr) %>% replace(is.na(.), 0) 
dfpropccr$week <- 0
dfpropccr[dfpropccr$time == 8,]$week <-  2
dfpropccr[dfpropccr$time == 15,]$week <- 3
dfpropccr[dfpropccr$time == 22,]$week <- 4
dfpropccr[dfpropccr$time == 29,]$week <- 5
  
dfpropnrg <- df %>% filter(time %in% c(14,21,28,35)) %>% select(turn,color,time,condition,note,propnrg) %>% replace(is.na(.), 0)
dfpropnrg$week <- 0
dfpropnrg[dfpropnrg$time == 14,]$week <-  2
dfpropnrg[dfpropnrg$time == 21,]$week <- 3
dfpropnrg[dfpropnrg$time == 28,]$week <- 4
dfpropnrg[dfpropnrg$time == 35,]$week <- 5

df_propcoop <- merge(dfpropccr,dfpropnrg,by=c("turn","color","condition","note")) %>% filter(color != 0)
df2 <- df_propcoop %>% filter(week.x == week.y)
df2$weekfin <- df2$week.x

df2long <- df2 %>% pivot_longer(cols = c(6,9), names_to = c("indicator"), values_to = "score")
  
ggplot(df2long, aes(x = weekfin,y = score, fill = indicator, color = color ))  + geom_bar(position = "dodge", stat = "identity")  + facet_grid(turn ~ condition)
  
```

```{r read_data1, echo=FALSE, include = TRUE}

variables <- c("Capitale totale","Guadagno giornaliero","Contributo comune","Mucche acquisite", "Mucche in vita","Mucche perse","Energia acquisita","Risorse ambientali","Giorni in vita farmers","Giorno")

long_df <- long_df %>% filter(turn %in% c("BR02"))

for (i in variables){

plot_i <- long_df[long_df$output == i,] %>% ggplot(aes(x = time, y = score)) + geom_line(aes(color = color)) +
  scale_color_manual("gruppo", values=c(azzurro="cyan", blu="blue", rosso = "red",giallo = "yellow",rosa = "pink")) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(0,35,7)) +
facet_grid(turn ~ factor(condition, levels = c("Prima simulazione","Seconda simulazione")), scales = "free_y") +
  labs(title = i, x = "giorni", y = i) +
  theme_bw( ) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45),legend.position = "bottom")

plot(plot_i)

}
```
